sentences.sContent: Talent, hard work and sheer tenacity are all crucial to career success.
sentences.sCn: 才能、勤奋和百分之百的执著对事业成功都是至关重要的。

remMethod.val: ten (拿住) + acity → 拿住不放 → 坚韧

words.tran: 顽强的；坚韧的；固执的；紧握的；黏着力强的

trans.tranCn: 韧性；固执；不屈不挠；黏性
trans.tranOther: If you have tenacity, you are very determined and do not give up easily
